page_content:
Key Highlights of 2021
Identified zero incidents of bribery, 
corruption, or other ethical issuesIntroduced Maxeon Air System, a 
disruptive new technologyOpened new Reliability Testing 
Lab in Malaysia to expand inhouse 
testing and quality control capabilities Introduced our industry-leading  
40-year solar panel warranty in  
early 2022Powered 899 MW of solar energy  
in 2021 
Introduced Career and 
Development Conversations and 
Individual Development Plans (IDP)Powering Sustainable Luxury 
Hotels with Renewable Energy Committed to sustainability long-
term targets pertaining to all material 
topics, to achieve by 2025 and 2030, 
with 2020 as our baseline year 
Became an inaugural member of 
the Singapore Low Carbon Network, 
launched in 2021 as part of PwC 
Singapore’s Asia Pacific Centre for 
Sustainability Excellence
Formed Partnerships for Positive 
Change including Solar Panels for 
Espressone GmbH, Urban Solutions 
with Solar Energy Research Institute 
of Singapore and National University 
of SingaporeTransitioned from IBC panels to 
the Performance Series (“P-Series”) 
panels at our Mexico facility Completed Energy Payback Time 
assessment for our solar panelsOur newly introduced Maxeon 
Leadership Training Programme  
ran its first course this year INTRODUCTION
GOVERNANCE OVERALL ENVIRONMENTAL SOCIAL
© 2022 Maxeon Solar Technologies
